{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3314607,"name":"","username":"Zylve","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/z/977dab/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-02-21T20:20:10.340Z","cooked":"

Hello. We have suddenly started having issues with connecting to our NavX-micro.

When the NavX-micro is connected to my laptop I can connect to it and read data just fine using NavXUI. However, when it is connected to our roborio 2 via usb, it causes program start up to stall on “Opening USB serial port to communicate with navX-Sensor.”

We have already tried updating the firmware, changing ports, and letting the gyro sit for a couple minutes, but the robot code seems to continue to get stuck on opening the serial port.

Any ideas?
